content.question: Many critics have interpreted The Steerage as a social commentary on conditions facing working-class Europeans crossing the Atlantic, while others have argued that the artist's primary purpose was to

choices.label: promote an American national identity through mass-produced, idealized images of migration
achieve a formal aesthetic in photography similar to that of Modernist abstract painting
create an allegorical image filled with narrative possibilities in a way that is similar to academic painting
document the mechanized interiors and crew activities on the ship during a transatlantic voyage

content.answer: achieve a formal aesthetic in photography similar to that of Modernist abstract painting

topic.text: 4.4: Theories and Interpretations of Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Describe one or more art historically relevant interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art), its reception, or its meaning.
